sections.general: senior customer service advocate professional profile over ten years of management and customers services skills in retail and call center environment. expert computing and technology skills in multiple software applications. qualifications training leadership counseling sales client support writing multitasking communications professional customer service microsoft office relevant experience increased client engagement in all active health products and services sales by 98%. each quarter.
